verses.verse: "Now this<WH2088> is the commandment,<WH4687> the statutes<WH2706> and the judgments<WH4941> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has commanded<WH6680> [me] to teach<WH3925> you, that you might do<WH6213> [them] in the land<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> you are going<WH5674> over<WH5674> to possess<WH3423> it,

so<WH4616> that you and your son<WH1121> and your grandson<WH1121> might fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to keep<WH8104> all<WH3605> His statutes<WH2708> and His commandments,<WH4687> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you, all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> of your life,<WH9132> and that your days<WH3117> may be prolonged.<WH748>

"O Israel,<WH3478> you should listen<WH8085> and be careful<WH8104> to do<WH6213> [it], that it may be well<WH3190> with you and that you may multiply<WH7235> greatly,<WH3966> just<WH9201> as the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers, has promised<WH1> you, [in] a land<WH1696> flowing<WH776> with milk<WH2100> and honey.<WH2461>
"Hear,<WH8085> O Israel!<WH3478> The Lord<WH3068> is our God,<WH430> the Lord<WH3068> is one!<WH259>
"And you shall love<WH157> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all<WH3605> your heart<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> your soul<WH5315> and with all<WH3605> your might.<WH3966>
"And these<WH428> words,<WH1697> which<WH834> I am commanding<WH6680> you today,<WH3117> shall be on your heart;<WH3824>

and you shall teach<WH8150> them diligently<WH8150> to your sons<WH1121> and shall talk<WH1696> of them when you sit<WH3427> in your house<WH1004> and when you walk<WH1980> by the way<WH1870> and when you lie<WH7901> down<WH7901> and when you rise<WH6965> up.
"And you shall bind<WH7194> them as a sign<WH226> on your hand<WH3027> and they shall be as frontals<WH2903> on your forehead.<WH996> <WH5869>
"And you shall write<WH3789> them on the doorposts<WH4201> of your house<WH1004> and on your gates.<WH8179>

"Then it shall come<WH1961> about when<WH3588> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> brings<WH935> you into the land<WH776> which<WH834> He swore<WH7650> to your fathers, Abraham,<WH1> Isaac<WH85> and Jacob,<WH3327> to give<WH3290> you, great<WH5414> and splendid<WH1419> cities<WH2896> which<WH5892> you did not build,<WH834>

and houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of all<WH3605> good<WH2898> things<WH2898> which<WH834> you did not fill,<WH4390> and hewn<WH2672> cisterns<WH953> which<WH834> you did not dig,<WH2672> vineyards<WH3754> and olive<WH2132> trees<WH2132> which<WH834> you did not plant,<WH5193> and you shall eat<WH398> and be satisfied,<WH7646>
then watch<WH8104> yourself, lest<WH6435> you forget<WH7911> the Lord<WH3068> who<WH834> brought<WH3318> you from the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> out of the house<WH1004> of slavery.<WH5650>
"You shall fear<WH3372> [only] the Lord<WH3068> your God;<WH430> and you shall worship<WH5647> Him, and swear<WH7650> by His name.<WH8034>
"You shall not follow<WH1980> <WH310> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> any<WH312> of the gods<WH430> of the peoples<WH5971> who<WH834> surround<WH5439> you,

for the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the midst<WH7130> of you is a jealous<WH7067> God;<WH410> otherwise<WH6435> the anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will be kindled<WH2734> against you, and He will wipe<WH8045> you off<WH4480> <WH5921> the face<WH6440> of the earth.<WH127>
"You shall not put<WH5254> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> to the test,<WH5254> as you tested<WH5254> [Him] at Massah.<WH4532>

"You should diligently<WH8104> keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and His testimonies<WH9381> and His statutes<WH2706> which<WH834> He has commanded<WH6680> you.

"And you shall do<WH6213> what is right<WH3477> and good<WH2896> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord,<WH3068> that it may be well<WH3190> with you and that you may go<WH935> in and possess<WH3423> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to [give] your fathers,
by driving<WH1920> out all<WH3605> your enemies<WH340> from before<WH6440> you, as the Lord<WH3068> has spoken.<WH1696>

"When<WH3588> your son<WH1121> asks<WH7592> you in time<WH4279> to come,<WH4279> saying,<WH559> 'What<WH4100> [do] the testimonies<WH9381> and the statutes<WH2706> and the judgments<WH4941> [mean] which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> you?'

then you shall say<WH559> to your son,<WH1121> 'We were slaves<WH5650> to Pharaoh<WH6547> in Egypt;<WH4714> and the Lord<WH3068> brought<WH3318> us from Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand.<WH3027>

'Moreover, the Lord<WH3068> showed<WH5414> great<WH1419> and distressing<WH7451> signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> before our eyes<WH5869> against Egypt,<WH4714> Pharaoh<WH6547> and all<WH3605> his household;<WH1004>
and He brought<WH3318> us out from there<WH8033> in order<WH4616> to bring<WH935> us in, to give<WH5414> us the land<WH776> which<WH834> He had sworn<WH7650> to our fathers.'

"So the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> us to observe<WH6213> all<WH3605> these<WH428> statutes,<WH2706> to fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> for our good<WH9185> always<WH3605> <WH3117> and for our survival,<WH2421> as [it is] today.<WH3117>

"And it will be righteousness<WH6666> for us if<WH3588> we are careful<WH8104> to observe<WH6213> all<WH3605> this<WH2088> commandment<WH4687> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> our God,<WH430> just<WH9201> as He commanded<WH6680> us.
